name: Horizon Zero Dawn - Game Boy Classic - DEMO
name_original: Horizon Zero Dawn - Game Boy Classic - DEMO
description:
As a huge Horizon fan, I decided to create some game boy pixel art and added a Horizon Forbidden West mockup game boy box just for fun.

I got so many amazing reactions that I decided to take it a step further. What would it take to turn this pixel art into an actual Game Boy game?

A real Horizon Game Boy Fan Game is now on its way!
To get a taste of what's coming, here's a DEMO you can play today!

For more info go to:
http://www.pedestalgames.com

DONATE to support me or if you would like to see more awesomeness like this!
